subject: Information Systems
description: في هذه المحاضرة تم شرح المفاهيم الأساسية لنظم المعلومات مثل البيانات والمعلومات وأنواع نظم المعلومات وأمثلة تطبيقية.

subject: Mathematics
description: Introduction to linear algebra concepts including vectors, matrices, and basic operations. This lecture covers fundamental mathematical concepts essential for cybersecurity applications.

subject: Programming
description: تعلم أساسيات البرمجة بلغة Python مع التركيز على المفاهيم الأساسية مثل المتغيرات والدوال والحلقات التكرارية.

subject: Network Security
description: Understanding network protocols and their security implications. This lecture covers TCP/IP, HTTP/HTTPS, and common security vulnerabilities in network communications.

subject: Cryptography
description: Introduction to cryptographic concepts including symmetric and asymmetric encryption, digital signatures, and hash functions.

subject: Information Systems
description: أمان قواعد البيانات ومفاهيم الحماية من الهجمات الشائعة مثل SQL Injection وحماية البيانات الحساسة.

subject: Ethical Hacking
description: Introduction to penetration testing methodologies, tools, and ethical considerations in cybersecurity testing.

subject: Mathematics
description: Probability theory fundamentals and their applications in cybersecurity risk assessment and statistical analysis.
